name: chadmichael14
body: Incredible to work with. We will be using his services for ALL our contracts and drops in the future. Very knowledgable of the space!

name: c_l_i_n_t_o_n
body: Writing a smart contract isn't too hard if you're familiar with development. However, after looking into doing this myself, I realised it's better to find some people who do this often and truly know what they're doing. With these guys that is exactly what I discovered. The end result; a smart contract that works, and a dapp to mint with. I'll be coming back for a second contract for sure!

name: notreallyvince
body: Great beyond expectations. Outstanding work, thorough and helped me with aspects of the project with which I was not familiar. Easily a 12 on a 1-10 scale. (Smart contract written for the sale of an NFT collection).

name: cyrusjohnson050
body: This seller IS THE TRUTH!!! Amazing service! Super knowledgeable and VERY patient. Rarely do you get all three:-) this is my second time deploying this collection and feel very confident that it will be a success this time!!! If you are serious about your NFT COLLECTION, book this seller!
